title: Boy With A Broken Heart
description:
'You're asking me to hold your hand. And now you're turning away from me. You are saying something but I can't hear you. It's too windy. You're crying now. Now you're smiling. I'm done. I love you...'
It's been two years since Raghu left his first love Brahmi on the edge of the roof one fateful night--he couldn't save her. Having lost everything, Raghu now wants to stay hidden from the world. However, the annoyingly persistent Advaita finds his elusiveness very attractive. And thee more he ignores her, the more she's drawn to him till she bulldozes her way into an unlikely friendship.What attracts at first, begins to grate. Advaita can't help but want to knwo what Raghu's left behind, what he's hiding, and who broke his heart. She wants to love him back to life, but for that she needs to discover what wrecked him in the first place .After all, the antidote to heartache is love.
author: Durjoy Datta
